column1: Narrator : The island is immense, and a gigantic collumn of smoke raises of top of it.
PlayerSpeak : We’ve got nothing to do here
Narrator : A castaway is standing on the shore. He waves at you.
column2: Narrator : A small child is sitting on the shore, skin n’ bones.
column4: OtherSpeak : I beg you, leave me alive

column2: OtherSpeak : I’ve been abandonned on this island…

column1: OtherSpeak : Three years i’ve been stranded on this island !
column2: OtherSpeak : My parents didn’t like my behavior.

column1: OtherSpeak : Take me with you, I beg you !

column12: Choice : I’ll be on my way (partir)

column2: Choice : Give us everything or you’re done ! (attaquer)
column4: Choice : Sorry pal’, no room on board
column10: OtherSpeak : I don’t know if I can trust you…
OtherSpeak :  I need to know if I’ll keep my child sould

column4: OtherSpeak : Give me at least something to get my teeth into
column10: OtherSpeak : I’ll join only if there’s a teddy bear on deck

column6: Choice : You keep eating coconuts alright ?
column12: Choice : I’ll be on my way (partir)

column11: OtherSpeak : By the way, while waiting :
OtherSpeak : I made this wonderful noodle neckless

column1: Choice : Buddy, you’re in luck, we’re leaving

column3: OtherSpeak : Faudra passer sur mon cadavre !

column2: Narrator : The boat is anchored on the shore. The morning air is fresh and light.
column3: PlayerSpeak : Nothing to get my teeths into.
